string-array.name: Lit_fest_event_Title
string-array.item: LITERATI
SPIN YARN
OPEN MIC
SLAM POETRY
BOOK PITCHING
WRITERS FIRST
JAM
DESI TWIST
HAIKU WORKSHOP
COMIC WORKSHOP

string-array.name: lit_fest_content
string-array.item: A plethora of events under the banner of Literati. Organizing 5 events, in some of the most popular formats:1. JAM (Just a minute)2. Anonymity (An on-the- spot letter writing competition)3. Spell Bee (An on-the- spot spelling competition) 4. Word Games (Fun vocabulary based games)

Are you passionate about entrancing people in the mystique of yourstories? Do characters come alive in your mind, flourishing under the light of creativity and doing a better job than truth itself? This event lets the participants put their heads together over an intriguing comic strip to create enthralling stories in front of an engaging audience. Storytelling is an art, and even more so when people want to listen. So buckle your seatbelts and let the story take over in this magical journey of storytelling and adventure, enrapturing listeners to your world.

Open mic is an event where anyone can grab the mic and perform. The performer is handed the mic to perform live on the stage in front of the audience. The event is focused on performance arts like poetry, spoken word, song, stand-up comedy, etc.

Slam poetry is a style of spoken word poetry which combines the skill of writing with the art of performing. It is about ordinary experiences being narrated like fantastic tales. It is a free form of poetry that utilises poetic tools and devices to convey a story, message or feeling towards a particular issue.
Engage with some of India’s finest authors as they discuss their latest works in a candid event suffused with literary vibrancy.
Present your best creative ideas to professional writers, let your heart roam and your spirit soar in this thought-provoking event.
Be your fluent best, conquer the stage, soak in the thunderous applause after delivering a confident speech to an enthralled audience
Remodel popular stories the way you want, modify endings and give literary classics that tangy twist.
We make each others’ stories as participants contribute lines that together make a story, much like the world.
Enjoy the intricacies of comic art and humour, the sweet-and-sour taste in the cocktail that is literature.
